event.name: RVS_FREIGHTER_ESCORT_DISTRESS

beaconType.undiscoveredTooltip: Encrypted distress beacon. Someone might need help.
beaconType.visitedTooltip: Explored location. Nothing left of interest.

event.text: You attempt to locate the source of the encrypted distress signal with short-range scans. A small Federation escort floats motionlessly amidst a cloud of gas. You tune in on Federation hailing frequencies: "Friendly vessel, we've taken heavy damage and are leaking fuel. Requesting immediate assistance."

choice.text: (Repair Weapon) Use your equipment to repair the ship efficiently.

event.text: A few salvos of your repair weapon patch up the ship easily, sealing their hull and preventing any further leaking.

choice.text: (Repair Ammo Weapon) Use your munition based equipment to repair the ship efficiently.

event.text: A few salvos of your repair weapon patch up the ship easily, sealing their hull and preventing any further leaking.

choice.text: (Repair Arm) Use your repair arm to repair the vessel.

event.text: The repair arm works with machine precision. Using a moderate amount of scrap and debris, it seals their fuel tanks and any other breaches, preventing any further leaking.

choice.text: (Repair Drone) Use your repair drone to repair their damage.

event.text: Once dispatched, the drone makes short work of the damage. It seals their fuel tanks and any other breaches, preventing any further leaking.

choice.text: (Repair Crew) Use your trained crew to repair their damage.

event.text: You dock with the ship and send your crew member to repair the ship's damage. Their experience and proficiency makes short work of the breaches, quickly sealing their fuel tanks and preventing any further leaking.

choice.text: Take time to repair their ship.

event.text: The fleet will make some headway, but you can't just leave this Federation ship stranded here. You dock with the vessel and send a team aboard, diligently repairing the damage until the its is no longer leaking fuel.

You don't think they'll be too happy that you couldn't help, but you assure them that if you do encounter any friendly ships that you will forward them their way. Still though, you can't help but feel disappointed with yourself that you couldn't assist them.

event.name: RVS_FREIGHTER_ESCORT_DISTRESS_OPTIONS
event.text: "Much obliged Merc. We were left stranded after we were attacked by Rebel interceptors gunning it to a military convoy we were escorting. Those tossers blew our bloody fuel tanks but not long after we sent them packing. We're still in a sorry state so I recommend you rendezvous with the convoy urgently. It is imperative that they make it to their objective. Do you acknowledge? over".

choice.text: Agree to rendezvous with the convoy.

event.text: You acknowledge their transmission and agree to rendezvous with the convoy and escort them to their destination. Their former escort reiterates the importance of this mission and for you to proceed with great urgency.
With the amount of fuel they've lost in the explosion and subsequent leak, they're still far from full working order. You offer to refuel their ship to help it get back up to running order.

choice.text: (Fuel Conserver) Offer them your fuel conserver.

event.text: It isn't hard to tell that they must be very low on fuel in between their fuel explosion and ensuing leak, but they still have enough fumes to go off of if they had a fuel conserver. You offer to transfer yours to help get them back up to running order.

You don't think they'll be too happy that you couldn't help, but you assure them that if you do encounter any friendly ships, you will forward them their way. Still, though, you can't help but feel disappointed with yourself and wonder if you could have done more.

event.name: RVS_FREIGHTER_ESCORT_DISTRESS_OPTIONS_HELPED
event.text: "With this, we could manage to reconnect with the convoy! However, if that last encounter was anything to go by, we still would need all the help we can get. I can't stress enough how important this mission is".

choice.text: Agree to rendezvous with the convoy.

event.text: You acknowledge their transmission and agree to rendezvous with the convoy and escort them to their destination. Their former escort reiterates the importance of this mission and for you to proceed with great urgency.

You have put considerable amount of time and resources into assisting the Federation ship and decide it is best to carry on and resume your mission, but you can't help but wonder what will happen to the convoy in your absence.

event.name: RVS_FREIGHTER_CONVOY
event.text: With patrols of Federation vessels in the area protecting a couple of armed orbital facilities it's no mistake that this is a Federation military checkpoint. Outside of the heavy military traffic at this beacon it's a relatively unremarkable star system though you can't seem to find where the convoy is.

It doesn't take long until a few ships begin jumping into the system. A few freighters and transports arrive along with their escorts trickling in one after the other till well more than a dozen ships arrive. This must be the convoy you were sent to escort! "Multiverse Renegade, this is Supply Officer Kyrylo in command of the Federation Ship Grebe. If I understand it correctly you are assigned to provide this convoy an additional escort, correct? Good. They've taken hits at nearly every turn and the Federation Fleet can't spare any of their ships in this sector for this mission and we're more than accepting of any help, even if it's from a Renegade, over".
[something something you agree and you got co-ordinates to a checkpoint]
[Something something you refuse]

If this convoy is important enough for the Rebels to try and prevent it from reaching its destination it must be carrying something very valuable or powerful. [Note to Dalv, I haven't finished this option. I reckon you can finish writing it up with a self justification for this action followed by a moral hit general and combat menu, ship turned hostile!]

event.name: RVS_FREIGHTER_CONVOY_CHECKPOINT_SAFE
event.text: You jump into a heavily militarised sector with the rest of the convoy following in suite. The Federation checkpoint hails you and after a quick exchange and flashing of IFF signals you are welcomed to help yourself to a quick resupply and repair.

With all the heavy military traffic here it's almost a surprise with how peaceful it is here. It will be difficult for the Rebels to track you here, assuming if the resistance here doesn't slow them instead.
You spend a couple hours carefully positioning the mines as instructed by a scruffy-looking Lieutenant

event.name: RVS_FREIGHTER_CONVOY_CHECKPOINT_HOSTILE
event.text: You jump into a heavily militarised sector with the rest of the convoy following in suite. The Federation checkpoint hails you and after a quick exchange and flashing of IFF signals you are welcomed to help yourself to a quick resupply and repair.

The perimeter alarms are set off and Federation ships scramble to intercept but a few ships leak through between the battle lines. You lock onto the biggest ship and move in to engage. You will have to hold the Rebels off while the convoy charges up their drives and jump away!
